scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w api && npm run build -w web
scripts.build:api: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w api
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:api && npm run start -w api
scripts.dev:swa: npx concurrently -k -n API,SWA -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:api" "npx @azure/static-web-apps-cli@latest start http://localhost:5173 --api-devserver-url http://localhost:7071 --run \"npm run dev:web\""
